sentences.sentence: Did Mom throw away your priceless Dungeons and Dragons magazine?.
sentences.translation: 妈妈扔掉了你那本宝贝杂志《龙与地下城》吗？

sentences.sentence: This is Dungeons & Dragons (D&D), the first of the role-playing games.
sentences.translation: 这是第一个角色扮演游戏“龙与地下城”（D&D）。

sentences.sentence: Where have I read something about dungeons?
sentences.translation: 我在哪读过过关于地牢的东西啊？
